description.en:
"You smell so good." "Sorry, but I might not be able to let you go."
 Touka, who secretly has a crush on her senior, is bewildered to find out he felt for her scent. Things develop quickly and she decides to support his dream of becoming a perfumer while they become dangerously close.

description.en:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

description.id:
Sebagai anak kedua, Karina menghabiskan hidupnya selalu mengalah pada kakak-adiknya. Suatu hari, dia diberitahu bahwa menggambar yang merupakan hobinya, membuat sisa hidupnya hanya tinggal satu tahun lagi. Tak ingin terus hidup tidak dianggap oleh keluarganya, dia memutuskan untuk pergi dari rumah. Dengan persiapan seadanya, dia pergi ke tempat tunangan yang tidak begitu dia kenal untuk menghabiskan sisa hidupnya.

description.it:
Come figlia di mezzo che non è né l'erede né gli amati gemelli più piccoli, Karina ha vissuto tutta la sua vita nascosta agli altri. Lei, che aveva un solo hobby della pittura, ha scoperto che le restava solo 1 anno di vita. Quindi senza un piano, è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"Non voglio tergiversare. Voglio passare un anno qui."

"...Mia Signora, sei impazzita?"

"In cambio, accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento."

Ma allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui, e che sarebbe arrivata ad avere un desiderio per vivere la sua vita un tempo priva di significato.

description.ja:
家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

description.ko:
가문의 후계자도, 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로,
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면, 여기서 1년간 지내고 싶어요."
"......미쳤나, 영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

---

description.ru:
Карина всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.

description.uk:
Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.
Так, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.

"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік."
"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?"
"В обмін на це я розірву заручини."

Однак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.

---

altTitles.zh-hk: 勇者們都想和魔王修煉

description.en: The cold-blooded Demon King who has beaten all his enemies, who has always been second to none, ended up losing all his magical powers to a female hero who hexed him. What is this magical ritual that you do with the opposite sex’s lips? I can’t believe that even I, the formidable Demon King, have been defeated by this mysterious move! But no worries, I can retrain my abilities. It doesn't matter if you’re a succubus, an elf, a beast woman, or a noble hero’s descendant. I’ll use you as my training partner if I can help it. In order to revive the demon race, I’ll show you the Dual Cultivation Method!

altTitles.ja: 花に噛みぐせ

description.en:
Even in her second year of high school, she has no friends. A young lady, Suu, who is a "loner" to the extreme, dreamed of a normal, uneventful adolescence. Then one day, a beautiful young man named Yuki appears in front of her. He was a mysterious boy who had lost his memory and was the first friend she had ever made. But what is he really...?

An instinctive love affair with a dangerous and sweet beast.

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.fr:
Momo Ayase et Ken Takakura sont tous deux lycéens. Tandis que la première croit aux fantômes, le second est fasciné par les extraterrestres. Évidemment, chacun se moque des croyances de l’autre. Incapables de se convaincre, ils se lancent un défi pour savoir lequel des deux a raison. Momo se retrouve dans un hôpital où des créatures de l’espace sont censées se trouver et Ken dans un tunnel hanté. C’est le début d’une romance survoltée où l’occulte, le paranormal et le surnaturel se bousculent dans un chaos haletant !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

title.en: Jingai Hime-sama, Hajimemashita ~Free Life Fantasy Online~

人外姫様、始めました ～Ｆｒｅｅ　Ｌｉｆｅ　Ｆａｎｔａｓｙ　Ｏｎｌｉｎｅ～

description.en:
Free Life Fantasy Online… a.k.a. FLFO.

Tsukishiro Kotone receives this game as gift from her little sister and starts playing. The character’s race she has selected was… one of “Inhuman” races for enthusiasts. A race said to be bad even among Inhuman races that are known to be difficult – a Zombie.  
  
Big Tiddies Onee-san playing Dark Soul VRMMO as Undead Princess.
description.ja:
金髪お嬢様・琴音の密かな趣味は、フルダイブ型ＶＲオンラインゲーム「Free Life Fantasy Online」だった！

リア充な日々から一転、ゲーム内では暗いカタコンベで、ゾンビになってソロプレイの日々を送っていた。だが探索中に、謎のレアアイテムを手に入れたことから、琴音は特殊進化を果たすのであった…！？

altTitles.ja: 青春ヘビーローテーション

description.en:
Nao falls in love at first sight with the hottie prince Haruna-kun, who helps her overcome anxiety during the high school entrance examination. She safely gets into high school and feels that she’s fated to the guy sitting next to her. However, Haruna-kun is very popular and has a habit of saying “I hate girls who tell me they like me.”. Even so, Haruna-kun still messes with Nao.
Nao gradually falls in love with him as she gets to know him better. Haruna-kun may look mean, but he’s actually very kind.

title.en: Kuchi ga Saketemo Kimi Ni Wa

altTitles.en: Even If You Slit My Mouth

altTitles.ja: 口が裂けても君には

description.en:
Miroku-san, the slit-mouth woman, is to marry high school student Kouichi to maintain her existence as his family has been in charge of upkeeping superstitions for generations. To add, there seems to be another reason that he seems more than willing…   
  
Miroku, however, would rather use her own strength than borrow that of others. Thus, they establish a contract as follows.  
1. For a trial period of a year, they are to act as though they were married.  
2. If she is able to scare him within that year, the engagement will be broken.  
 
---

*This is the three-part short story's official serialization, which began on the Shonen Jump+ website on November 10, 2020.*
description.fr:
Miroku-san, la femme à la bouche fendue, doit épouser Kouichi, un lycéen, pour maintenir son existence, car sa famille est responsable de l'entretien des superstitions depuis des générations. Pour ajouter, il semble y avoir une autre raison pour laquelle il semble plus que disposé …   
  
Miroku, cependant, préfère utiliser sa propre force plutôt que d'emprunter celle des autres. Ainsi, ils établissent un contrat comme suit.   
1. Pendant une période d'essai d'un an, ils doivent agir comme s'ils étaient mariés.   
2. Si elle parvient à lui faire peur dans l'année, l'engagement sera rompu.
description.pt-br:
Miroku-san, a mulher com a boca cortada, vai se casar com o estudante Kouichi do ensino médio para manter sua existência, já que sua família é responsável por manter superstições há gerações. Para adicionar, parece haver outra razão pela qual ele parece mais do que disposto...

Miroku, entretanto, prefere usar sua própria força do que pedir emprestada a de outros. Assim, eles estabelecem um contrato:
1. Por um período experimental de um ano, devem agir como se estivessem casados;
2. Se ela conseguir assustá-lo naquele ano, o noivado será rompido.

description.en:
On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days!

Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?
description.ja:
**離婚から始まる、新感覚ラブコメ！**

夫婦関係は冷え切り、離婚届を出したその帰り道。 黒瀬航平は自動車に轢かれ…高校時代にタイムスリップしてしまった！？ 新たな人生を謳歌しようと決意し高校へと向かうが、そこには当然、 元嫁の柚花がいて―――。

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!

Seorang Putri yang ditahan oleh pasukan Raja Iblis, disiapkan untuk menerima siksaan dari Raja Iblis tanpa henti!

description.en: A close and dangerous cohabitation with the cult leader's son has begun! Chungah was swindled by her uncle who she trusted and her parents disappeared, saying they are chasing their missing uncle, and Chungah suddenly lives alone in an empty house. But it wasn't just Chungah's family that was scammed! The biggest cult in the autonomous district, "Millennium Adventist Church," was also deceived by her uncle. And "Yohan," the son of the cult leader came to Chung-ah's house. He's dragging his luggage in...! God, is this cohabitation gonna be okay?
description.uk: Інтимне та небезпечне співмешкання з сином лідера культу почалось! Чону обманув її дядько, якому вона довіряла і її батьки пропали, коли сказали, що шукатимуть його, і раптом Чона живе одна в пустому будинку. Але обманули не тільки сім‘ю Чони! Найбільший культ в автономному районі «тисячолітня адвентистська церква» була теж обдурена її дядьком. І «Йохан», син лідера культу, прийшов до Чони додому. Він заносить свої речі…! Боже, що ж буде з цим співжиттям?
description.pt-br: Uma vida próxima e perigosa do filho do líder de um culto começou! Chungah foi enganada por seu tio em quem confiava e seus pais desapareceram, dizendo que estavam perseguindo seu tio desaparecido, e Chungah de repente vive sozinha em uma casa vazia. Mas não foi só a família de Chungah que foi enganada! O maior culto do distrito autônomo, "Igreja Adventista do Milênio", também foi enganado por seu tio. E "Yohan", o filho do líder do culto, veio à casa de Chung-ah. Ele está arrastando sua mala para dentro...! Deus, será que esta coabitação vai ficar bem?

description.en:
The story of a contract marriage set in an old-fashioned goldfish shop. 

Asahi and Nana are newlyweds who run a goldfish shop. At first glance, they seem to be a normal couple, but in fact, they are a contractual couple who got married because of their mutual interests! They are not true husband and wive,  let alone lovers. And yet...

[I'm sorry. I know this is our first time meeting, but will you marry me?]

Precarious Woman Executive Miss Black General

description.en: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
description.pt-br: Braveman é um super herói como qualquer outro. Infelizmente pra ele, sua arqui-inimiga é sua stalker e sua fã número 1. Acompanhe as aventuras de Braveman e sua luta incansável contra seu maior adversário enquanto tenta não perder a cabeça.

description.en: Hoshino, a member of the baseball club meets Yamada, a classmate who has just transferred to his new school. She cries loudly that she was "mugged" and makes a certain "request" to him. The world's funniest master-slave relationship between a clueless girl and a good-natured little guy is about to begin.

altTitles.ja: ねずみロワイアル

description.en: We were taken to some island, thinking it was a school trip. What was declared there was the beginning of a battle to the death. It seems only five people can board the boat that will come 28 days later... Nishibe, indecisive and timid, is bewildered by the sudden event. Can he really survive? The cute and deadly mouse deathmatch begins."
description.ja: 修学旅行だと思って連れてかれたどこかの島。そこで宣告されたのは殺し合いが始まることだった。２８日後に来る迎えの舟に乗れるのは５人だけらしい・・・・。突然の出来事にうろたえる優柔不断で弱気な西部（にしべ）君。果たして彼は生き残ることができるのか。かわいくてみえてくらっちゃう、ねずみデスゲーム開幕。

altTitles.ja: 高音さんと嵐ちゃん

title.en: S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

description.en:
**I'm done with romance, so send me home!**

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.
Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home!
Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?!?!

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

Can I go home......?
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

title.en: The Blue Eye of Horus: The Story of a Queen Dressed as a Man

description.en:
It's the beginning of a new era in the Egypt of pharaohs, the marriage of the young Hatshepsut to her half-brother Seti ensures his rise to Pharaoh, under the name of Thutmose II.

Ambassadors of the gods on Earth, they shine to their people and seem at first glance like the perfect couple. However, under her mask of a perfect wife, Hatshepsut hides a deep rage… She doesn't want to accept the restrictions others try to place on her as a woman, she wants to become the Pharaoh, like her father!  
 
---

*Loosely based on the actual [historical figure](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hatshepsut).*

altTitles.ja: フェイト／アポクリファ

description.en:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
description.ru: События Fate/Apocrypha происходят в мире параллельном миру Fate/stay night, в котором Грааль был убран из города Фуюки после Третьей Войны. История начинается с того, что в Румынии был обнаружен «726-ой Святой Грааль». Его похитила и привезла в Румынию семья Иггдмилленния. Это знаменует начало Великой Войны Святого Грааля в городе Трифас с двумя противоборствующими сторонами: Чёрная Фракция, члены которой являются частью семьи Иггдмилленния и Красная Фракция, члены которой были посланы Ассоциацией Магов, за исключением одного участника от Церкви. Грааль также призывает Рулера выступать в качестве посредника в Войне Святого Грааля.
description.vi:
Nội dung của Fate/Apocrypha vẫn xoay quanh Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh tại thành phố Fuyuki nhưng diễn ra trong một thế giới song song với thế giới của Fate/Stay Night. Tại đây, sau Cuộc Chiến Chén Thánh lần thứ 3, Đại Chén Thánh của thành phố Fuyuki đã đột ngột biến mất một cách bí ẩn.

Rất lâu sau đó, vào thời điểm những năm 2000, một gia tộc mang tên gọi Yggdmilennia đã công khai việc đánh cắp Chén Thánh của họ đồng thời tách rời khỏi Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư. Để đoạt lại Chén Thánh, Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư đã cử đi 50 thành viên tinh nhuệ nhất của mình nhưng tất cả đều bị Servant Lancer của nhà Yggdmilennia tiêu diệt. Tuy nhiên, người sống sót cuối cùng trong 50 pháp sư đã kịp kích hoạt cơ chế dự phòng của Đại Chén Thánh, được sử dụng nhằm ngăn chặn sự hợp tác giữa các Servant bằng cách cho phép 7 Master và 7 Servant mới được tham gia vào trận chiến. Từ đó mở màn cho cuộc Đại Chiến Chén Thánh với 14 Master cùng 14 Servant tại thành phố Trifas giữa Hắc Trận Doanh – những thành viên của gia tộc Yggdmilennia và Xích Trận Doanh – những Master đại diện cho Hiệp Hội Pháp Sư.

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

description.en:
Alexandra is the duchess of the Kingdom of Tarraconensis. It was only the day before the absolution event that she realized that she was the villainous daughter of an otome game! It's clear that she'll be denounced and her engagement will be broken tomorrow.
But I don't want to be condemned honestly! I'd rather show my eyes to the people who despised me! With only 24 hours left, Alexandra begins to make a breakthrough in her desperate situation.
description.id:
Alexandra adalah putri seorang duke dari Kerajaan Tarraconensis. 
Ketika dia telah sadar jika dia adalah seorang villaness dari sebuah otome game, waktu yang tersisa sebelum acara pembatalan pertunangan hanya tersisa satu hari saja!
Sudah dipastikan bahwa saat itu akan diumumkan pembatalan pertunangannya!
Tapi dia tidak ingin hanya menerima pembatalan itu! melainkan dia ingin melakukan perlawanan kepada orang-orang yang membencinya!
Hanya tersisa 24 jam saja, alexandra memulai langkahnya untuk bisa keluar dari situasi keputus-asaan ini.

苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

description.en:
When Hiyori - a young girl whose deceased father taught her the joys of fishing - headed out to sea for some alone time, she never thought that she would encounter another girl there.  
After a while, this girl - named Koharu - and her end up fishing and cooking together, and they get to know each other a bit in the meantime. During their brief time together Koharu finds out that the reason that Hiyori went out to sea that day was because she's hesitant towards meeting her new stepfamily that same evening. But what a coincidence! Koharu is also meeting her new family tonight! "No. It can't be a coincidence…" Follow these two 'sisters' and their new life together!  


---
description.ru: Хиори любит ловить рыбу с берега. Этому научил ее отец. Однажды на пляже она знакомится с Кохару, своей сводной сестрой от нового брака матери Хиори.

altTitles.th: วันพันช์แมน

description.en:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**
description.fa: در جهان اَبَر قهرمان ها قهرمانی بسیار قدرتمند و شکست ناپذیر وجود داره که به (مرد تک مشتی) معروفه چون اون تمامی دشمنان و رقیب هاشو فقط با یک مشت از میدان به در میکنه. بعد از مدتی سایتاما  دیگه از مبارزاتش لذت نمیبره و احساساتی مثل هیجان و ترس رو در خودش فراموش میکنه! و همراه تنها شاگردش که یک سایبورگ هست به انتظار رقیبی خوب ، ماجراهایی رو دنبال میکنن و……
description.ru: Манга повествует о молодом человеке по имени Сайтама. Он — герой, обычный герой. Основная его проблема в том, что он вышибает дух из злодеев одним ударом. А это очень скучно…
description.tr:
Üç yıllık sıkı bir eğitimden sonra, Saitama, tek bir yumrukla herkesi ve her şeyi alt etmesine izin veren muazzam bir güç kazandı. Bir kahraman olarak yeni becerisini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. Bununla birlikte, canavarları kolayca yenmekten çabucak sıkılır ve kahraman olma kıvılcımını geri getirmek için birinin ona meydan okumasını ister.
  Bir cyborg olan Genos, Saitama'nın inanılmaz gücüne tanık olduktan sonra, Saitama'nın çırağı olmaya kararlıdır. Bu süre zarfında Saitama, Kahraman Derneği'nin bir parçası olmadığı için ne hak ettiği takdiri görmediğini ne de insanlar tarafından tanınmadığını fark eder. İtibarını artırmak isteyen Saitama, Genos'u öğrenci olarak alması karşılığında kendisine kaydettirmeye karar verir. İkisi birlikte, güçlü düşmanlar bulmayı ve bu süreçte saygı kazanmayı umarak gerçek kahramanlar olma yolunda ilerlemeye başlar.
description.pt-br: One-Punch Man conta a história de Saitama, um super-herói extremamente poderoso, que se entediou com a ausência dos desafios nas suas lutas contra o mau e procura encontrar um oponente digno para lutar.

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

altTitles.ja: のんのんびより

description.en: Elementary school student Ichijou Hotaru has moved with her parents from Tokyo to the middle of the country. Now she must adapt to her new school, where there are a total of 5 students in the same class who range through elementary and middle school ages. Join their everyday adventures in the countryside.
description.ru:
История разворачивается в отдаленной деревеньке Асахигаока, в школе, где учится всего пять учеников, причем каждый — на разном году обучения. Однажды 11-летняя Хотару Итидзё переселилась из Токио в настоящую японскую глубинку – настолько глухую, что до ближайшего книжного магазина час езды поездом. Нравы здесь простые, двери никто не запирает – зачем, ведь все друг друга знают до седьмого колена. Излишне говорить, что в сельской школе в одной комнате учится все местное детское население – первоклассница Рэнгэ, семиклассница Нацуми, ее сестра восьмиклассница Комари и их на год старший брат Сугуру. А теперь вот еще и пятиклассница Хотару прибавилась! Конечно, сперва многие сцены деревенского быта показались юной столичной жительнице странными и необычными. Но потом Хотару, кстати, в обоих отношениях весьма развитая для своего возраста, начала понимать, что «на всякого мудреца довольно простоты». На природе под ясным небом чувства делаются проще, чище и глубже, а развлекаться с подругами среди полей и холмов можно не хуже, чем в каменных джунглях Гиндзы или Синдзюку. У главной героини появился отличный шанс стать лучше, мудрее и ответственнее, и тогда за взрослую и зрелую девушку ее будет принимать не только наивная малышка Комари!

description.pt-br:
Bem-vindo à vila rural de Asahigaoka, uma pitoresca cidade distante da agitação da cidade grande. Você não poderia imaginar um cenário mais isolado em todo o Japão. Então, quando Hotaru Ichijo, uma estudante do ensino fundamental criada em Tóquio, se transfere para a pequena escola secundária de Asahigaoka devido ao trabalho de seu pai, ela enfrenta o choque cultural de sua vida!

Junte-se a Hotaru e seus novos amigos, a excêntrica Renge e as irmãs travessas Natsumi e Komari, enquanto compartilham aventuras diárias no idílico interior japonês.

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

altTitles.ja: ディアーアネモネ

description.en: When Gaku lands on the Galapagos Islands, a paradise is the last thing he'll be experiencing. With creatures undergoing horrific evolutions, only one rule still stands--the survival of the fittest!
description.fr: Gaku Hachiue et un groupe d'investigation débarquent sur les "îles Galapagos", réputées être un paradis pour les plantes et les animaux. Mais à la place, ils rencontrent des créatures qui ont évolué d'une manière qui leur est propre. Les seuls à pouvoir survivre dans une situation où la vie est brutalement piétinée, et à la loi du plus fort, sont ceux capable d'évoluer à travers des changements répétés.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.ja: 幼女戦記

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Affection

altTitles.en: The Villainess Is Shy in Receiving Love
The Villainess Is Shy to Be Loved

altTitles.ja: 悪役なのに愛されすぎています

altTitles.th: สาวน้อยตัวร้ายชักรู้สึกเขินอายที่ได้รับความรัก

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !

description.en:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
description.fr: Dès que Gu Changge s’est rendu compte qu’il avait transgressé un monde imaginaire, le protagoniste de ce monde, l’élu de la fortune, a juré de se venger de lui. Envié par tous, non seulement la femme principale est folle de lui, mais il est également traité comme un invité de marque partout où il va. Heureusement, le prestige et le pouvoir de Gu Changge sont supérieurs à ceux de tous les autres, alors il ne devrait pas être facile de piétiner un simple élu de la fortune ?
description.id:
Begitu Gu Changge menyadari dia telah masuk ke sebuah dunia fantasi, protagonis dunia itu yang dengan beruntungnya terpilih, bersumpah untuk melakukan balas dendam terhadapnya. Semua orang sangat iri pada Protagonis itu, karena bukan hanya karakter utama wanita tergila-gila padanya, tapi dia juga selalu diperlakukan sebagai tamu kehormatan kemanapun dia pergi. Untungnya, martabat dan kekuatan Gu Changge jauh melebihi milik orang lain, sehingga dia tidak dengan mudah jatuh di tangan orang yang hanya terpilih karena keberuntungannya?

 

Tunggu dulu… ada sistem yang didedikasikan untuk meraup dan mengambil dari apa yang dimiliki protagonis? Gu Changge tersenyum. “Sepertinya takdir pun ingin aku memenuhi takdirku sebagai orang jahat di dunia ini!”
description.pl: Gu Changge zostaje przeniesiony do świata wuxia, gdzie z miejsca staje się obiektem nienawiści protagonisty, będącego Wybrańcem Losu, gdyż nie dość, że główna bohaterka rzuca mu się w ramiona, to jeszcze jest przez wszystkich traktowany niczym znamienity gość. Na szczęście jego postać cechuje znacząca siła, więc powinien bez trudu zmiażdżyć jakiegoś w czepku urodzonego dzieciaka, prawda? “Chwila… Otrzymałem wyspecjalizowany system, który pozwala mi okradać głównego bohatera ze szczęścia?” Gu Changge uśmiechnął się znacząco. “Zdaje się, że moim przeznaczeniem jest podążanie ścieżką prowadzącą do stania się największym czarnym charakterem w tym świecie!”
description.ru:
Гу Чангэ попадает в фэнтези-мир, где, по-классике, оказывается в шкуре главного козла отпущения.
Удивительно, что главный герой сразу же снизыскал расположение у императрицы, чем вызвал бурю ненависти в свой адрес. К счастью, Чангэ - уважаемый человек в городе и единственное, что его спасает от кары в данной ситуации это высокий статус в обществе. Подождите-ка... а вы уже знаете, что здесь есть необычная система рангов, в которой присутствуют яркие герои всех мастей? Проанализировав события, герой понимает, что выгоднее всего вжиться в свою новую роль и пойти по пути персонажа-злодея!
description.pt-br: Imediatamente após Gu Changge perceber que havia transmigrado para um mundo de fantasia, o protagonista do mundo, e o escolhido da fortuna, jurou se vingar dele. Invejado por todos, ele não só tem a liderança feminina de ponta-cabeça por ele, mas também é tratado como um distinto convidado onde quer que vá. Felizmente, o prestígio e o poder de Gu Changge são superiores aos de todos os outros, então não deveria ser fácil pisar em uma mera escolha da fortuna? Espere … Existe um sistema dedicado à ordenha e colheita do protagonista? Gu Changge sorriu. “Parece que até o destino quer que eu cumpra meu destino como o vilão deste mundo!”

title.en: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.en: Previous Life was Sword Emperor. This Life is Trash Prince.

altTitles.ja-ro: Zensei wa Ken Mikado. Konjou Kuzu Ouji

altTitles.ja: 前世は剣帝。今生クズ王子

altTitles.zh-hk: 前世是劍帝。今生是渣王子

altTitles.pt-br: Na Minha Vida Anterior Eu Era o Imperador da Espada. Nesta vida sou um Príncipe Lixo.

altTitles.en: Sword Emperor Previous Life, Prince Trash This Life.

description.en:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
description.pt-br: A espada, vivia pela espada e morria pela espada. Depois de dias e meses de batalha, o espadachim escolheu a morte por sua própria vontade, mas renasceu como Fai Hanse Diestburg, o terceiro príncipe do reino de Diestburg. Querendo se distanciar de sua vida passada, onde vivia como possuído pela espada, Fai decidiu levar uma vida perdulária, ganhando o apelido de “Príncipe Lixo”. No entanto, um dia, devido a um trato com a casa real de Afillis, o reino vizinho, Fai é enviado para a guerra, liderando tropas de reforço. No campo de batalha, Fai testemunha uma cena de desespero quando o “Herói”, uma existência com poder rivalizando com dezenas de milhares, varre o campo de batalha. Fai considerou retornar ao reino, mas a morte de um certo cavaleiro conseguiu abalar seu coração, então ele decidiu empunhar a espada mais uma vez – a lenda do príncipe preguiçoso mais forte começa!

altTitles.ja: 佐々木と宮野

description.en: It all started like a typical old-school boys’ love plotline—bad-boy senior meets adorably awkward underclassman, one of them falls in love, and so on and so forth. But although Miyano is a self-proclaimed boys’ love expert, he hasn’t quite realized…he’s in one himself. Which means it’s up to Sasaki to make sure their story has a happily ever after…!

title.en: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~

altTitles.ja: 俺だけ不遇スキルの異世界召喚叛逆記～最弱スキル【吸収】が全てを飲み込むまで～

altTitles.en: I'm the Only One with a Failure of a Skill in Another World's Summoning Rebellion: Until the Weakest Skill [Absorption] Swallows Everything

description.en: The student Nakatani Yuto was supposed to be having a regular life, however his whole class was transferred to another world. All the students gained powerful skills and were worshipped as heroes, but for Yuto who got the unfavorable skill [Absorption]...! ?
description.ja: 高校生の中谷夕斗は突然クラスメイトと共に異世界へ「勇者」として召喚されてしまう。クラスメイト達が強力な技能（スキル）を授かるなか、ユウトが授かったのは不遇スキル【吸】であった。 使い物にならないユウトは魔物との戦闘で致命傷を負うが、クラスメイトは彼を見殺しに…。その瞬間、ユウトにはどこからともなく“声”が聞こえて――…!?

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: BonHyakuSenSai ~ Jinrui no Jumyou wa Takadaka 100-nen desu ga Kikai no Watashi wa 1000-nen Ikirareru node, Anata ga Inaku natte mo kono Basho de Hitori Ikiteikimasu kara Goshinpainaku ~

altTitles.en: The Human Lifespan Lasts No Longer Than 100 years, but I, as a Machine, Can Live Upwards of 1000, so Do Not Worry, I will Continue on Alone Here Even After You are Gone

altTitles.ja: 盆百千栽〜人類の寿命はたかだか100年ですが機械の私は1000年生きられるのであなたが居なくなってもこの場所で一人生きていきますからご心配なく〜

description.en:
Androids and bonsai trees have one thing in common: they'll both outlast a human's lifespan. Kanna, an android, receives lessons from the "Sensei" who runs the bonsai shop, Kifu Garden. As "Sensei" regaled her with the wonders of bonsai, Kanna would watch with eyes full of curiosity...

A long time has passed since then, and Kanna is the only one remaining at Kifu Garden. Though, a new face seems to have come to visit... A truly human tale of the long lives of bonsai and androids comes together in this brand-new drama.
